message.body: Heading to the city now! Ill let you know when I get to my dorm
Okay! I'm leaving Neighborhood School in a few
Here!
Just turned onto Broome, passing Bowery....I think I'm close
Yup you are!! Just a few blocks
I'm outside now
Ok you can wait inside! Ill be right down
Okay!

Good meeting with Gina! She says she likes our democratic secret vote, and she's happy to be a tiebreaker but she trusts our judgment. She also says the whole blackboard system is going away, so minors on the email list will have to be by whoever expresses interest. And finally, we should have AT LEAST one event per month - the more the better!
Ok sounds good! We should find a way to contact minors to see if they want to be added to the listserve

That was the one problem: she says there's some policy about handing out email addresses to us. But she says when she meets with minors (for advisement, in class, etc.), she plans to ask all of them if they want to be added. We'll add them if they want it. So she likes the idea, and it's out of our hands now =P
Ok perfect!
Another bf idea: when it gets warm go to governors island, and also look up the cloisters :)
I just love you forever!!
Lol ill be your VP and date planner
Wait, dead serious question, can we double date!? Haha
Haha of course! Just let me know when he comes up
Ahhhh YAYAYAY!!!
What did gina think of the co-rep idea?

She loved it! She actually likes all the freshman. Oh also - Gina suggested that those who don't get chosen for eBoard, can be part of "committees". If we have long term projects (ie. Welcome Week), we can call on the committee members to kind of organize the event and check in with us
What do you think? I think it'd be a good solution for those who don't get on eBoard, so long as we can think of things for them to do
Yeah cause if they don't get it they might be discouraged. And we can open up committees to everyone again to encourage more involvement
Yeah yeah! I mean we don't need to do interviews or a whole application. We'll throw out the suggestion to everyone and tell them to contact us if they're interested
But we need to think of committee ideas... Haha
We can ask if they have any special interests during the interview - if someone has a particular interest, we can work with that for sure
True I remember one person said she likes arts and crafts - that would be a good committee! Like around art but also publicity
We could absolutely do a publicity committee! Like to actually design it!
And anytime we have an artsy type project, we call on the committee (or chair, if it only winds up being one person)
Perfect for t-shirt design and if we wanna make pretty things for the fb page or emails lol
YES. Also, formatting emails will be so much easier now. Blackboard is dead, so we'll be using the NSSLHA gmail
Ahh true we can make it look pretty!
Yes! Or organized/spaced out, at the very least. Haha
And we should decide how to do the emails. Like one email per event? Or a biweekly email? I like the biweekly bc people will expect it
I agree with you. Biweekly is more expected and even, plus it won't just be about events - it can be whatever else we wanna discuss every 2 weeks
Yup but all on the google doc and we can go through everything with everyone else!
Yes yes! Agreed!
I wonder if we should book the teaching lab for the interviews just to be safe
I think so! Just wanna make sure it's good for most of eBoard and for most of the applicants, should I email the applicants?
I feel like there's no point til its okay with all of us first
I agree. Christiana won't be able to this Monday, Hugo and Ilana and I can though. Can you?
*Monday the 28th
Yup I can! We can always fill her in
Awesome stuff!! I wanna Skype her in, but I know she has to puppy sit. Haha
se some may have class - I think sunny does til 6:10
Aww oh no! Well penelope just replied so that's 5 of us which I think is enough! Message the applicants! Maybe say anytime between 5-6:30 or whatever cau
5-6:30 is ideal! Are 15 minute interviews sufficient?
Aw, Penelope is cute
Yeah I think so! And I'm sure at least one we'll have to do separately
Mhm. Hopefully we won't have to, so we can just vote then
Or maybe we can schedule it before at some point (the 27th or earlier on the 28th) so we'll have everything done anyway
I think it's just hard with class schedules and everyone moving back in and all that.....those could be our alternate times, though, I like that
Scheduling anything with this many people is hard! It'll be fine :)
Haha, we'll be fine! I'm so excited, everyone is so receptive =)
Same! I wonder if we should have melissa stop by if she can just so we can all meet her
Just to chat with her, would be nice. But lets pencil everyone else in first
Do we need to add any interview questions?
Wanted to ask about committees - if they'd be interested, had any ideas or inclinations, etc.
Ok ill add that!
Thank you!!
I was just on Twitter....grad school open house!? Where did you go?
Adelphi haha had a free day so figured I'd go!
Haha, nice! Was it that bad though??
No just different!! Like there were moms and people who've held other jobs for years.. Its going to be a much different experience
Definitely different....hopefully the transition is smooth =)
Haha I know! But now I think I wanna stay in new york more
YEAH!! New York is the best! And I think it'll make your transition into grad school a lot easier
I just don't wanna say good bye to a social life :(
You won't!! I think most classes will be at night, and you'll probably have clinic during the day, but you should still have weekends
I don't wanna grow up lol
Haha. It'll all be worth it though, in the end!
Ugh I know lol I just hope I can still have fun in grad school
Amen to that.....but if not, it's a means to an end =P
Haha no I'm just having quarter life crisis
Quarter life crisis!! Haha! I love it. (Not that you're having one....I like the term)
Its ok I still have lots of time as an undergrad left just gotta make the most of it
You do! You've got a full year and a half. =) Are you still gonna take a year off before grad school?
Prob not lol waa
You are going to be fine though!! I actually started freaking about grad school today.....oops
Hahaha ok now you're definitely ahead cause I'm even ahead
Haha. I have problems. Oh wait, did you get Kelly Bridges' email about people needing to switch to the other class,
I did! What do you think?
I don't care either way, it's the same class time and everything =P
The risk is that we know bridges is a good teacher but were unsure about henry lol
I just wanna be in class with you and Christiana =P
Hmm.....this is true. Maybe we hold off for now, haha
I feel like everyone is thinking that haha
We totally are. I assume there will be another desperate email in a week or two
I'm going to check the enrollment number for our section lol
Haha, okay! I think the class is still open
Yeah its 24. Ugh idk, do you think we should be the brave souls? Lol
......if the number doesn't go down in a week or so, perhaps. I'm chicken =P
Hahaha ok sounds good
